channel.title: Rumspring Crypto-Amish Church
channel.description: Recent content on Rumspring Crypto-Amish Church

item.title: Welcome to Rumspring!
item.description: Rumspring is a new crypto-Amish congregation in central Texas. Join us for fellowship every Sunday morning at 10am. We meet at 4200 Cortina Dr, Austin, TX 78749. We invite you to join us as we seek to follow Jesus in community.
